year_1_description: Golden age of Vijayanagara Empire; architectural peak.
year_2_description: Popular UNESCO site, overcrowded during peak seasons.
year_3_description: Eco-zoned heritage site with augmented-reality reconstructions.

year_1_description: Formalization of Sattriya dance in monastic settings.
year_2_description: Declining practitioner numbers; threatened by tourism neglect.
year_3_description: Revived via digital education programs & government grants.

year_1_description: Pilgrimage hub, untainted by modern development.
year_2_description: Still spiritually alive, but threatened by pollution and crowding.
year_3_description: Regulated sacred zone with river cleanup and visitor limits.
